UVMC Connection Example - Basic Testbench, SV side
This example shows a SV producer driving an SC consumer via a TLM1 UVMC put connection, and an SC consumer sending transactions to a SV scoreboard via a TLM1 analysis connection.
This example is derived from the UVM Connect examples, so the diagramdepicts components with TLM2 sockets.

This example shows a SV producer driving an SC consumer via a TLM1 UVMC put connection, and an SC consumer sending transactions to a SV scoreboard via a TLM1 analysis connection.  It also makes a local (SV-to-SV) UVM analysis connection between the producer and scoreboard.  See UVMC Connection Example - Basic Testbench, SC side for the SC portion of this example.

This example is derived from the UVM Connect examples, so the diagram

depicts components with TLM2 sockets.  TLM2 is not available in OVM, so this OVM components use TLM1 blocking put ports.  Whether sockets or ports/exports, the connection syntax is the same.

The sv_main top-level module below creates and starts the SV portion of this example.  It does the following:

  • Creates an instance of producer and scoreboard components
  • Registers the producer’s out port with UVMC using the string “stimulus”.  During elaboration, UVMC will connect this port with some other TLM port registered with the same lookup string.  In this example, the match will occur with the consumer’s in imp on the SC side.
  • Registers the scoredboard’s actual_in analysis export with UVMC using the string “analysis”.  During elaboration, UVMC will connect this export with a TLM port registered with the same lookup string.  In this example, the match will occur with the consumers’s ap analysis port on the SC side.
  • Connects the producer’s analysis port, ap, to the scoreboard’s expect_in analysis export using a native UVM connect call.
  • Calls run_test to start UVM simulation

These connections would normally be made in the connect method of a UVM component.  This example does not show that for sake of brevity and highlighting the UVMC connect calls.

.../examples_ovm/connections/sv2sc2sv.sv


import ovm_pkg::*; 
import ovmc_pkg::*;

`include "producer.sv"
`include "scoreboard.sv"

module sv_main;

  producer prod = new("prod");
  scoreboard sb = new("sb");

  initial begin

    // normal SV-only connection
    prod.ap.connect(sb.expect_in);

    // TLM2 connection
    uvmc_tlm1 #(packet)::connect(prod.out, "stimulus");

    // TLM1 connection
    uvmc_tlm1 #(packet)::connect(sb.actual_in, "analysis");

    run_test();
  end

endmodule
